text: Nodopelta is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Peltospiridae. ==Species== Species within the genus Nodopelta include: * Nodopelta heminoda McLean, 1989 * Nodopelta rigneae Warén & Bouchet, 2001 * Nodopelta subnoda McLean, 1989 ==References== Category:Peltospiridae
title: Nodopelta
